title: Launch Vehicle Missions Summary
content: A total of 97 Launch Vehicle Missions have been successfully completed from SDSC SHAR, Sriharikota.

title: Sounding Rocket Complex Activity
content: A total of 538 launches have been conducted from the Sounding Rocket Complex.

title: Experimental Missions Summary
content: There have been 5 experimental missions launched from SDSC SHAR.

title: Launch Statistics by Vehicle Type
content: Total launches by vehicle type include: PSLV (63), GSLV (16), LVM3 (7), SSLV (3), ASLV (4), SLV (4).

title: Sounding Rocket Launch Statistics
content: Sounding rocket launches include: RH-125 (30), RH-200 (370), RH-300 (18), RH-560 (52), Others (67).

title: Launch Charts Overview
content: Launch chart visualizations include: All Launch Vehicles, 63 PSLV Launches, 17 GSLV & 7 LVM3 Launches, 53 Launches from FLP, and 37 Launches from SLP.

title: PSLV Versatility
content: The PSLV has demonstrated remarkable versatility across variants and mission orbits, illustrated through detailed pie charts.
